attributes.action: Create a Fuel Gratuity for Pensioners, who do not have the benefit of Central Heating!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the advent of Winter in the UK, and the numerous amount of aged, who either live alone or reside in dwellings without any form of heating. It is requested that the Prime Minister look into the prospects of combating this problem on their behalf, by offering a Fuel Gratuity, be it in the form of Coupns or Cash on a fortnightly/monthly basis.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
